title: The Seven Year Itch
description:
Justin Channell, Cherry Zonkowski, and Javier Morillo share stories about mayo-filled condoms, going stag at an orgy, and a family's journey to the truth.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Wendy D. Lewis, Hope Brush, Doves, Javier Morillo, Alfred Newman, Justin Channell, Papik, Cherry Zonkowski, Kevin Allison)
